A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson did the best he could with what Abrams handed him. The biggest criticisms of the movie come from people who had their own idea of what was going to happen and when they were presented with something original\, they freaked out. Star Wars Fans : \"WAHH TFA is just a New Hope Remake!\" Also Star Wars Fans: \"WAHH! TLJ is too original!\"
